src:
Låt inte megafonderna sluka PPM-kapitalet
LEDARE. Brottsmisstankarna mot PPM-fonderna Falcon Funds och Allra har gett ammunition till dem som vill förklara systemet som misslyckat. Men det är bara ett fåtal fonder som fallerat.
04 Nov 2019, 18:30 by Lotta Engzell-Larsson

text:
Do not allow the megafunds to devour PPM capital
LEADER. The crime suspicions against the Falcon Funds and Allra PPM funds have provided ammunition to those who wish to declare the system as unsuccessful. But only a few funds have failed.
04 Nov 2019, 18:30 by Lotta Engzell-Larsson
